attributes.title: barb
attributes.review: So this app was a good idea in thought, but that’s all it is, a good idea. First thing I notice when I go onto the app is it’s set up almost like a cult. Help donald by doing this and that. This to me shows that he is not confident in winning future elections and that his stance is unsure. How can someone lead this country if they aren’t even capable of doing things solo, requesting the help from his followers.

attributes.title: Nasty
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to educate myself on the beliefs of the opposing side so I could understand the way they think. The second I opened this app I was disgusted. It functions like it’s older than the dusty crusty Cheeto himself, by crashing all the time. It is an absolute disgrace of an app, much like the toupee the orange man wears to protect his bald head from the sun. If I could give this app a lower rating I would.

attributes.title: Very bad fat orange
attributes.review: Alright so this app took forever to download it took two weeks!!! This is not worth the wait! Because usually it took a few minutes and this app took longer and your deleted tiktok!!! Tiktok is fun and you ruined at I hope the person that runs this App Store deletes this thing! You have created! No one likes you! Your a mean! And you are racist! Ugly rat BLM

attributes.title: This app ruined my life
attributes.review: This app made me go back to therapy✨. After downloading i went through it to see what it was all about and man should I not have done that. it made me have ✨🧚‍♂️suicidal thoughts ⚡️🧜‍♀️because of all the harmful material i came across. Now in back losing money paying for a therapist to work through my new found issues fr this app. THIS IS HORRENDOUS SHOULD BE TAKEN DOWN.

attributes.title: ✨disgusting✨
attributes.review: I thought it would be a good idea to get this app to see what the White House is using our tax money for as soon as I downloaded it I felt sick to my stomach as soon when it asked for my number bc I didn’t want any Karen’s to  find out where I lived the whole website seems sus I won’t be trying anything like this again don’t get this app EVER

attributes.title: Trump is a bad president.
attributes.review: I downloaded this app for its soul purpose only to discover what horrible orange man he was. If you’re going to try and take Gen Z’s most prized possession (tiktok), then you can bet we aren’t going down without a fight. We almost took out google classroom, and we are the ones who threw the tear gas back at the police. Don’t be surprised when your app is gone, trump. 😌💅✨💕😋

attributes.title: ✨ew✨
attributes.review: i downloaded this app so i can stay up to date with the “president’s” horrible campaign along with his racist and homophobic beliefs that only benefit rich white cis men.  i was deeply saddened when after waiting TWO WEEKS for the app to download that, this app constantly glitches and malfunctioned.  i was horribly depressed that i couldn’t see the president’s uneducated opinion.  anyway #settleforbiden and stan nicki😹.

attributes.title: ✨This app has ruined my life✨
attributes.review:
I got the app to see what the great ✨ORANGE✨ had to say and in the process of downloading the app my son tripped over my big phat juicy kankles and broke his knee caps and his spleen fell out and his kidney burst and now we are drowning in debt and on the way to the hospital we hit a deer and it broke the car window. All of this could have been avoided had this app not have been made.
-Karen Kankleson

attributes.title: Cheeto puffs 😝
attributes.review: when i first opened the app it asked for my number 😱😱 so inappropriate probably because im underage and the orange is a pedo 🤪🤪🤪anyways then A BUNCH AND I MEAN A BUNCH OF ADS CAME UP 😚😚😚 it left my phone in flames🤠🤠🤠 then after that a orange cheeto was yelling at me because it said that the Blm movement is illigal but i said no it’s not so then he sent a orange dragon my way(mind you i like chicken) :((((( i don’t recommend this app 😷😷😷🦗🦟🦗🦟🦗🦗🦟

attributes.title: ✨Kill me✨
attributes.review:
👀I mean even as satan, I would like this man to NEVER go to hell or heaven👊😔. He needs his own special place 👁👄👁. Now time to say why I got this app, I didn't I was scrolling to find some stuff and I saw this😭😭. Like... I didn't need to see this pumpkin🎃 pie 🥧. Like even me, satan was terrified of this.
